settings.title: HearClear™ Hearing Aids
settings.content:
Packed with Power. Loaded with Savings.

Save up to 90% off with our direct-to-consumer prices.

Start saving now.

settings.pretext: Save up to 90% on HearClear™ Hearing Aids
settings.title: It's A Sound Decision.
settings.text: You can spend thousands of dollars on an expensive hearing aid or you can save up to 90% off list for a hearing aid that’s packed with technology and great for just about every hearing loss situation.

settings.title: Direct-To-Consumer Pricing
settings.text: We sell direct, eliminating the middleman and expensive brick-and-mortar rent. Then, we ignore the list price to bring you the best hearing aids for the money.

settings.title: Hear Your Favorite Sounds Again
settings.text:
Imagine being able to hear your grandchildren laugh and giggle. Or never having to ask your family and friends to repeat themselves.

Advanced Affordable Hearing Can Help.

settings.title: Traveling with ease.
settings.text: Our advanced, affordable HearClear™ digital hearing aids bring back the sounds of life in a discreet, convenient, and compact fashion.

settings.title: Rich text
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc. If you have a large amount of text, you can opt to have it display in two columns instead so that it's much easier to read.



This section also includes the option to add a button in primary or secondary style, and also control the colors, including the option for a gradient background. Since this is rich text, you can also format it as you wish and include links.

Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc. If you have a large amount of text, you can opt to have it display in two columns instead so that it's much easier to read.



This section also includes the option to add a button in primary or secondary style, and also control the colors, including the option for a gradient background. Since this is rich text, you can also format it as you wish and include links.

settings.title: Why should I choose Advanced Affordable Hearing?
settings.answer:
Being in business for over 26 years has taught us that customers like you come first. We are genuinely trying to help you overcome any hearing loss issues that you may have and save you money in the process.

We understand that when you are shopping for top quality, digital hearing aids, there is a lot of competition and that price is an important consideration. Generally speaking, local hearing centers tend to inflate their prices several times over their original cost, so that they can cover overhead and other miscellaneous costs while still maintaining huge profit margins. They do this by offering extra or additional services that are often unnecessary. At Advanced Affordable Hearing, we do not feel this is best for the customer because our goal is to help people hear better AND save money in the process.

We strive to keep our hearing aids at affordable prices by NOT doing what others do. We do NOT:

• charge for fitting fees

• charge sales tax

• charge pre-paid future office visits

• offer hearing aids with unnecessary (and often expensive) features

As a result, your hearing aids come to you at a cost you can afford. That is our promise to you and we are confident that our hearing aids will help improve your hearing loss.

We have literally helped thousands of customers and provided them with a hearing loss solution that has changed their lives forever. Take a look at what people are saying about us;

settings.title: Why is Advanced Affordable Hearing the Best Choice?
settings.answer:
Advanced Affordable Hearing offers tremendous value, packing in more technology for the price than other companies. Our digital chips are a step above, and by cutting out overhead costs, we are able to provide our innovative hearing aids at a price that can’t be beaten.

Our Care Team has some of the most experienced and knowledgeable folks in the business. And with 25 years of experience and an A+ BBB rating, you can rest assured that we will do our absolute best to get you the hearing aid that’s right for you.

settings.title: How can I get help with my hearing aids after I buy them?
settings.answer: We have trained technicians available for support Monday through Friday to help you with any questions you might have. Please call them at 1-888-570-2740

settings.html_content:
Good

HearClear GO

For mild hearing loss, the GO is our most affordable rechargeable hearing aid and offers exceptional value. This is perfect for those at the beginning stages of hearing loss and comes with its own charging dock for an all-day charge.

List price $1,129 Pair

Our price $418 pair

You save: 63% ($711)

or $239 for a single

Shop Now

Better

HearClear PLUS

For moderate hearing loss, the rechargeable PLUS packs in technology usually found in much more expensive hearing aids. It has better processing chip than the GO and provides four scientifically based custom settings for improved clarity.

List price $1,850 Pair

Our price $518 pair

You save: 72% ($1,332)

or $269 for a single

Shop Now

Best

HearClear PRO

For mild to severe hearing loss, the PRO is our best-selling rechargeable. It offers amazing value, our most advanced digital chip, the easiest volume control and directional microphones for better speech understanding in noisy situations.

List price $6,480 Pair

Our price $648 pair

You save: 90% ($5,832)

or $349 for a single

Shop Now

Over 25 Years in Business with Thousands
of 5-Star Reviews
settings.text: We've put our customers first for over 25 years and have an A+ BBB rating. We stand by every HearClear™ hearing aid we sell. Check out our stellar reviews!

settings.title: As Seen on TV and in the Magazines You Trust
Iron-clad Guarantee
settings.text: We’re so certain you're going to love your HearClear™ hearing aids that we offer an iron-clad money back guarantee. If you're unsatisfied for any reason, just return your hearing aids within 30 days for a full refund. You have everything to gain and nothing to risk. Use our secure online ordering or call our Care Team at 1 800 804-0434 today.

settings.title: HearClear™ Hearing Aids: Loaded with Technology
settings.text: We pack our hearing aids with state-of-the-art third generation, digital microchips for crystal clear sound. With automatic noise reduction and a feedback canceler you’ll get much better overall sound for a fraction of the list price. Our hearing aids are almost always significantly better than the competition for the price. It’s perhaps the best value in America.

settings.title: Free Telecare Service from our Customer Care Team
settings.text: With our free telecare service, you can call our knowledgeable care team from the comfort of your home. We'll discuss your specific hearing loss situation and find the hearing aids that's perfect for you. Our hearing aids come pre-programmed so you can start hearing better right out of the box.

settings.title: Small and Discreet, with Easy Volume Control
settings.text: Our HearClear™ Hearing Aids are powerful, digital FDA-registered small and discreet devices. Our processing chips provide crystal clear sound and makes speech easier to understand with less feedback than old analog technology. And, with our rechargeable hearing aids, you won’t need to worry about replacing batteries! You'll receive a full day of use and a free charging station.

Our Care Team can be reached at 1 800 804-0434.

settings.title: An American Company with an A+ BBB Rating
settings.text: We’ve been in business for over 26 years and have maintained a strict A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau. We're here to help you for the long haul, with outstanding service and affordable prices.

settings.title: Do What You Love Again!
settings.text:
With our digital, rechargeable hearing aids you can do the things you love. Imagine hearing all the words your spouse, friends or grandchildren say. Or hearing the birds outside. And not being distracted in a noisy room. Watch TV with ease, and enjoy the more intimate, quiet moments. With adjustable volume controls, you're in complete control.

So take back your life, and save a lot of money. It's completely risk-free.

Thomas M.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Karina R.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Exceptional Customer Service and Amazing Support

I have worked with Advanced Affordable Hearing twice and both times I received exceptional customer service and amazing support. My father was able to get the gift of hearing (and we the gift of no longer needing to scream at him), while being treated with respect, kindness and efficiency.

John D.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

100% Satisfaction with Friendly People

I would say I have100% satisfaction! Very friendly people, timely shipping and great follow up!

Robert B.

Verified Buyer

I don’t have to tell my wife “I can’t hear you.” It’s very easy to set the volume. I’ve had it for months with no problems.

Paula O.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Just Plain Awesome!

I have tried In the past 6 months, Audien, Miracle Ear and Advanced Affordable Hearing hearing aids. Bottom line: Advanced Affordable Hearing Aids blew away the cost, size, quality, and performance.

Laura A.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Highly Recommended

Advanced Affordable Hearing has the most affordable hearing aid accessories that I've found! I got exactly what I needed for half the price I normally pay, and I didn't even have to leave my house.

Steven B.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Great Products and Service

Nicole is great. I sent my son David, and my brother Randy to you and they both bought, too.

Jon H.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Thank You for an Outstanding Product

I'm extremely pleased with all aspects of my new hearing aids. Many years ago, I tried some very expensive hearing aids that actually did virtually nothing to help me with my hearing. But when seeing the advertisement for the HCR3 rechargeable hearing aids, I assumed that the advances we've seen through the years in all other areas of technology would be true as well in the realm of hearing aids. And I've not been disappointed. They are simple to use, they are comfortable in my ears, and they clearly are capable of assisting my hearing range. Thank you for an outstanding product.

Jim W.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

They Earned This!

Yes, I would rate my experience with AAH as "great" because that’s what everything has been—quality and price of the hearing aids, ease of ordering, prompt shipping, no problems at all! Please keep up the good work—you have what it takes to succeed!

Rudolph S.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Satisfied!

I have used your hearing aids for years and you are always so prompt in shipping any supplies I need. Your prices are great, and they have helped my hearing SO much. Without them, I am nearly deaf.

Al F.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Awesome Product!

They are wonderful. My husband and I can’t afford the thousands of dollars it takes to go to an audiologist so this was our choice for my husband whom has a major hearing loss. They fit very nice, and he can hear clearly—better than he could for years. Most happy!

Nancy E.

Verified Buyer
5.0 star rating

Excellent Customer Service.

Twice I dealt with Crystal on the phone. She couldn’t have been nicer, also very helpful. I am still adjusting to the hearing aids as I had to change out the domes. The company has been very pleasant to deal with.

Jerry B.

Verified Buyer

Reasonably Priced

Reasonably priced hearing aids with quality built in.

Gary C.

New Customer for Life.

Best customer service! I'll be a repeat customer.

Robert L.

Worth Every Penny

The hearing aids are everything I could ask for. Comfortable. Small. Recharge easily. Worth every penny.

Edward R.

Good Value and Performance.

Works better than a much more expensive pair I have owned. Time will tell as to how well they hold up, but satisfied so far. Also like the ease of changing volume and environment settings.

Hearing 25% better

Hearing 25% better now than I did before with the more expensive hearing aids and your customer service is outstanding.

For noticeable to severe hearing loss, the B-DIRECT is our battery-operated hearing aid that comes with directional microphones. This helps you focus on what’s in front of you and enjoy better hearing in noisy settings. It's a great value in digital technology.

List $1,826 Pair

Our Price $548 pair

You save: 70% ($1,278)

or $299 for a Single

Learn more

B-POWER

For those with severe to profound hearing loss, the B-POWER is our most powerful, battery-operated hearing aid, designed to supply high volume levels without feedback. It features 12 bands of frequency shaping and 10 bands of noise reduction.

Our price $478 pair

or $249 for a single

settings.title: FAQs
settings.text:
Why is Advanced Affordable Hearing the Best Choice?
Advanced Affordable Hearing offers tremendous value, packing in more technology for the price than other companies. Our digital chips are a step above, and by cutting out overhead costs, we are able to provide our innovative hearing aids at a price that can’t be beaten.

Our Care Team has some of the most experienced and knowledgeable folks in the business. And with 25 years of experience and an A+ BBB rating, you can rest assured that we will do our absolute best to get you the hearing aid that’s right for you.

How do I place an order?
You can place an order on our website or call a member of our knowledgeable Care Team at 1 (800) 318-1395, Monday-Friday from 9 am-7 pm EST. For your convenience, we also offer email assistance at support@advancedaffordablehearing.com

Are these real hearing aids?
Yes! Advanced Affordable Hearing only sells true FDA-registered digital hearing aids. They are not sound amplifiers, hearing helpers, or the like. 

Are these hearing aids analog or digital?
Every hearing aid we sell utilizes digital technology.

What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit and debit cards, as well as PayPal.

We also accept check and money order payments. Please contact us at support@advancedaffordablehearing.com or call us at 1 (800) 318-1395 for details regarding ordering and non-credit card payments.

We can also accept CareCredit as payment. To do this, please call or email us to place your order because there is no automated process on our website to complete CareCredit orders.

What is the return policy for Advanced Affordable Hearing?
Advanced Affordable Hearing offers a completely Risk-Free 30-day Trial to try our hearing aids. Your 30-day trial begins when you receive your products based on USPS tracking information we receive from USPS. 

Please contact us for a Return Merchandise Authorization or if you have any questions regarding our return policy. As shipping and handling charges are non-refundable, your refund will be for the total order amount less shipping charges. You’ll be happy to know that we do not charge any restocking fees.

What is CareCredit?
CareCredit is a healthcare credit card designed for your health and wellness needs that allows you to make convenient monthly payments. To use CareCredit, set up your CareCredit account prior to placing an order with us by visiting CareCredit's website.

Can I pay in installments?
Yes, there are financing options available through third-party vendors (not directly through Advanced Affordable Hearing). So your installment payments will be made through whichever of the following companies you choose:
• Affirm
• PayPal Credit
• CareCredit

Does Advanced Affordable Hearing accept insurance payments?
While we do not accept insurance, we will work with you and provide any documentation your insurance company may need to reimburse you for the purchase. To do this, please contact your insurance company first to see if they would accept an out-of-network claim.

Keep in mind that our low prices may make us your best option, versus higher priced hearing aids that could be partially covered by your insurance.

When will my order be shipped?
Most in-stock items are processed and shipped within 1 to 3 business days. Our normal business days are Monday - Friday, excluding holidays. We ship via USPS.

Please note: we cannot process your order until we have received payment. If you are paying by check or money order, please mail your check as soon as possible and include your order number on it. We will prepare your order for shipment as soon as it arrives. We reserve the right to cancel your order if your check/money order payment is not received within 30 days. 

Can you ship to Canada?
Absolutely! We love our Canadian neighbors.

Where can I try the hearing aids?
We ship them directly to you with a risk-free, 30-day money back guarantee so you can try them in the comfort of your home. Additionally, our hearing aids come with a manufacturer’s warranty of either 6 months or 1 year depending on the hearing aid. This gives you the opportunity to decide whether the hearing aids you purchased are best suited for your hearing loss.

I can’t login because I forgot my password. What can I do?
Go to the Account login screen and click on the Forgot your password link. You will need to remember the username OR email address that was used to originally create your account. If you do not remember the username or email address, please call us at 1-888-570-2740 (or send an email to support@advancedaffordablehearing.com), so we can verify your identity and help retrieve your password.

How can I get help with my hearing aids after I buy them?
We have trained technicians available for support Monday through Friday to help you with any questions you might have. Please call them at 1-888-570-2740

How often should I change my tubes and domes?
We recommend changing them at least once every 3 months. Regular visual inspection can oftentimes extend the use or alert you if they need to be cleaned.

settings.title: More Power for the Money
settings.text:
Advanced Affordable Hearing is an American company that packs remarkable sound clarity into our world-class, medical-grade HearClear hearing aids for a fraction of the suggested list price.

How do we do this? We sell direct, eliminating the middleman and expensive brick and mortar rent that can add thousands to the overall cost.

We place state-of-the-art, data-based technology features into all our hearing aids, powered by advanced digital microchips. Dollar-for-dollar, they're almost always better than the competition.

Our HearClear hearing aids help people with mild to profound hearing loss (depending on the model), for much less than local offices. The highly advanced microphone and custom settings provide superior clarity with much lower feedback in various situations.

Our prices are so low because of our direct-to-consumer pricing and the sheer volume of hearing aids we sell. We've helped tens of thousands of customers achieve better hearing, while maintaining the highest A+ BBB rating over 25 years.

Our tremendous value and iron-clad money-back guarantee make this an extraordinarily risk-free sound decision.

See how Advanced Affordable Hearing can help you hear better today.

settings.title: Take A Look At Our HearClear™ Hearing Aids
Custom Programmable Digital Hearing Aid Only $299*
settings.description: The new HearClear™ is a stunning breakthrough in technology! Fully programmable by you or remotely by an expert! At an incredibly low, low price…

settings.description-copy: Experience the difference that a fully customized hearing aid will make without spending $3,000 or more for a traditional hearing aid. Our new technology allows you to experience the remarkable benefits of a custom-programmed hearing aid at a fraction of the cost of traditional hearing aids. Specially priced at under $300, the HCRA programmable hearing aid is simply the best all-around value available.
settings.bottom-bun: At Checkout to Recieve Your Discount

settings.instructions: Just click the option that works for you and you will be taken directly to checkout so you can apply your coupon code and get the hearing aid(s) you need!

settings.gallery_title: Customized Hearing Experience with HearClear™ HCRA
settings.gallery_copy: The HCRA sounds great right out of the box, or we can custom program it for your individual situation. You can even program and adjust it yourself using our FREE Smart Phone App! And to add even more value, you can request support from our experts to remotely program your hearing aids for you!

settings.features_title: Remote App Control for Personalized Programming and Remote Support
settings.features_content:
The HearClear™ HC Remote app takes your hearing experience to the next level. With this app, you can personalize your hearing experience by programming the hearing aids with your audiogram or use the built-in hearing check. Plus, the app provides remote support, so you can:

  • Adjust the volume.
  • Adjust compression and bass settings.
  • Input your audiogram for a custom programmed experience.
  • Take an in-app Hearing Check to custom program your HCRA.
  • Request professional assistance.

settings.section_title: Request professional assistance from within the app to make adjustments to your hearing aids.
settings.section_copy: Get professional assistance for your hearing aids with ease. Simply tap the button to connect with our expert support staff from anywhere in the world. They will provide remote support and send you a new program to use, which you can choose to adopt or revert back to your previous settings. Don't hesitate to seek the help you need for optimal hearing aid performance.
